issue.body:

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

performed_via_github_app.name: GitHub Actions
performed_via_github_app.description: Automate your workflow from idea to production

issue.title: ici.radio-canada.ca
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://ici.radio-canada.ca/tele/question-de-jugement/site/episodes/923921/jeudi-20-juin-2024](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fici.radio-canada.ca%2Ftele%2Fquestion-de-jugement%2Fsite%2Fepisodes%2F923921%2Fjeudi-20-juin-2024) ### Comment > il semble que le site est changé de quoi, pour forcer les scripts à être utilisé. Il ne marche plus avec le bloqueur et je ne peut pas voir ce que le bloqueur bloque (les 17) car il ne s'ouvre pas avec la souris, bouton gauche pour voir la liste de blocage du site et de pouvoir tester certains blocage ou pas! Username: `@Neome` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ofkpjeb0q680wsgc08w0oggoo4sgcc08o94dm6w7c4.png?nc=1)

Screenshot 2 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/66eugzrekpwk48go08swkgskccgwokstn4i10mixao.jpg?nc=1)

AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

AdGuard French
